thread.title: Former NBA player, family of Stephon Clark call for justice

title: Former NBA player, family of Stephon Clark call for justice
text:
Former NBA player, family of Stephon Clark call for justice Saturday, March 31, 2018 - 01:16 
''You know, I mean I fear for the streets. And now I've got to fear for the cops,'' says former Sacramento Kings basketball player Matt Barnes during a demonstration to protest the fatal police shooting of Stephon Clark. Rough Cut   
"You know, I mean I fear for the streets. And now I've got to fear for the cops," says former Sacramento Kings basketball player Matt Barnes during a demonstration to protest the fatal police shooting of Stephon Clark. Rough Cut  //reut.rs/2J8JwBt
